author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct wafer size for the v11 version. It is also wrong for v9 and v10. But the corrected size is not added in the old workflows

#### PR validation:

Tested with standard matrix test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx226 Correct wafer size for the HGCal V11 version
